::Aerotaur::
    He tilts his head at Grounded, "So your word is law?  No matter."  He 
smirks and turns back to Sarge and glares.  "We will have to decide this 
later."  He paces around the room, until Arrow speaks up.  "I hadn't noticed 
that they were Maximals however, I still think we should work with them.  For 
one thing they owe us for aiding in the protection of their base on one, 
perhaps two occasions, and we saved one of their pods from the Alliance.  
They should be ... receptive."
